description: head and shoulders of a young man with head turned slightly to the right; a row of houses sit just behind his shoulders with a house on the left having a steeple with a cross at the top; image drawn with thin black lines
inscription: LLC of sheet, in pencil: E 4 48/25 E-88-B-I/I Steine | LRC of sheet, in pencil: ml.- | LLC of sheet in pencil, on verso: 2179

title: Man's Head with Houses
